title: Leader

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -Send your goon to deal a basic attack at someone.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-TIs will see your goon visiting.
-Bodyguards will kill your goon, but wont die.
-If your goon dies, you will attack instead.

desc:
Post 287
*Leading the Mafia isnt easy. Ask the Godfather.*
